alert.note: Alert for Bastrop (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 3:30PM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Bastrop County through 400 PM CST... At 330 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rosanky, or 9 miles southwest of Smithville, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bastrop, Smithville, Circle D-KC Estates, Camp Swift, Rosanky, Upton, Bastrop State Park, Hills Prairie, Togo, String Prairie, Alum Creek, Buescher State Park and Kovar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
